title: LISTEN: The Debate - Feb 1: Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher
description: Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher take over The Debate for a post-Deadline Day look back at the January transfer window.
content: With the dust just beginning to settle after a record January for Premier League clubs, the Sky Sports pundits have their say on the business the top-six clubs have conducted.After Bournemouth inflicted an embarrassing defeat on champions Chelsea, Nev and Carra examine Antonio Conte's tenure at Stamford Bridge and what the future holds for the Italian.Conte's counterpart in north London, Arsene Wenger, is next under the spotlight after a shock defeat at Swansea dampened the Gunners' handling of the Alexis Sanchez saga with the acquisition of Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Henrikh Mkhitaryan.The performances of Paul Pogba and Harry Kane in Tottenham's victory over Manchester United are then on the agenda, before Nev and Carra answer each others' questons before debating who should line up in England first game at this summer's World Cup.For all that and more, listen to the latest edition of The Debate podcast.Never miss an episode of the The Debate by subscribing via iTunes
